quote: And the more I considered Christianity, the more I found that while it had established a rule and order, the chief aim of of that order was to give room for good things to run wild.
quote_letters: AND THE MORE I CONSIDERED CHRISTIANITY THE MORE I FOUND THAT WHILE IT HAD ESTABLISHED A RULE AND ORDER THE CHIEF AIM OF OF THAT ORDER WAS TO GIVE ROOM FOR GOOD THINGS TO RUN WILD
